attr.attrdef: Route label from the MnDOT LRS systems; updated annually by hand; where I=Interstate Highway, TH=Trunk Highway, CSAH=County State Aid Highway, CR=County Road, MSAS=Municipal State Aid Street.
Adjustment factor group assigned to a count location to adjust raw data to annaul data.
Unique site identifier within the Vehicle Classification Program.
Adjustment factor group assigned to a count location to adjust axles to vehicles.
Comments on how the traffic data value was produced.
Street name from the MnDOT LRS systems; updated annually by hand.
Adjustment factor group assigned to a count location to adjust raw data to annaul data.
Description of the location on a traffic segment where a count was taken.
Unique site identifier within the Total Volume Program.

citeinfo.title: Annual Average Daily Traffic Segments in Minnesota

descript.abstract:
AADT represents current (most recent) Annual Average Daily Traffic on sampled road systems. This information is displayed using the SDW_INCDT.TRAFFIC_SEGMENTS_ACTIVE feature class as of the annual HPMS freeze in January. Historical AADT is found in another table. Please note that updates to this dataset are on an annual basis, therefore the data may not match ground conditions or may not be available for new roadways.
The AADT_HISTORY_SAMPLED is not in the Commons yet. Please contact Christy Prentice to get a copy of the AADT_HISTORY_SAMPLED.
descript.purpose: Determine general estimates of segment specific, annual average daily traffic (AADT) on various route systems to meet FHWA annual reporting and assist in the annual allocation of state aid to local government for roadway maintenance and construction. Counts are taken on portions of the system each year so complete coverage for a given jurisdiction is generally accomplished on a two or four or 12 year cycle. More information about the Traffic Volume Program can be found at: www.dot.state.mn.us/traffic/data/

citeinfo.title: Annual Average Daily Traffic Segments in Minnesota

theme.themekey: Traffic Counts, Transportation, Short Counts, Traffic Volume, AADT

idinfo.useconst: None. Please check sources, scale, accuracy, currentness and other available information. Please confirm that you are using the most recent copy of both data and metadata. Acknowledgement of the publisher would be appreciated.

timeperd.current: Year in which the most recent count data was collected.
